original_text: The light of the body is the eye: therefore when thine eye is single, thy whole body also is full of light; but when thine eye is evil, thy body also is full of darkness.
korean_text: 네 몸의 등불은 눈이라 네 눈이 성하면 온 몸이 밝을 것이요 만일 나쁘면 네 몸도 어두우리라

sentences.original_text: The light of the body is the eye
Therefore when thine eye is single
Thy whole body also is full of light
But when thine eye is evil
Thy body also is full of darkness
